class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 6 - July 28, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Spring, Summer (Vienna). The second of the two-course sequence (201-202) that explores how different societal factors have affected German-speaking young adults' coming of age and draws comparisons with English language cultures. Continued focus on development of students' German language abilities.
sections: Class Nbr: 1352, Section #: 900, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Höyng/Walter, Status: Open
